Instruction: Preheat your oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (175 degrees Celsius).
Combine flour and salt in a bowl. Blend in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Add milk and mix to form dough using your hands.

Roll out the dough on a lightly floured surface until it's about 1/4 inch thick. Cut the dough into sandwich-sized pieces and use a fork to poke each piece several times. Then, transfer the slices onto a baking sheet.
